attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently if you disagree with a petition, you have to either create a new petition, or sign the current petition with a comment saying that you disagree with it. The latter will count as a signing for the petition and there for skews the totals. It would be better if you had an option to sign for or against the petition.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to team@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
